column5: Any body have recent experience with Sunset Country Adventures? https://sunsetcountryadventures.com/I'm looking to transition to a drive in camp as I head into retirement. I've sent some questions to their email address, but have not had a response. I know that this is busy season, but non-response to an email about booking makes me a little nervous. Anybody have experience to share?
Donâ€™t have personal experience there but the owners are quite active on Facebook and they appear to have a lot of repeat business. Have to be drive in? What about boat in?
Prov1800 might know alittle something about that place.

Steve and Erin run that place on Edward Lake.Busy camp.Well run.Good fishing as it's on the Indian Lake Chain.If they don't get back to you or there to busy give clarks a call and see if they have room at KC,s Landing same lake same shoreline.

Thanks... I think Clarks is unlikely. I got spooked by the negative reviews about deposit issues that I've read. I'll ping Steve and Erin again. I am sure that they are busy. Maybe busy enough to not have to worry about getting new customers? Good for them. Nice to see small family run businesses doing well.
There is also Indian Lake camp if you need another option.
